{ Number(obj.hotels[obj.key].wifi)? : } Free-Wifi
{args.rating}

{args.price}
{args.price}
) return(
{obj.hotels[obj.key].name}
{obj.hotels[obj.key].rating}
{obj.hotels[obj.key].price}
{obj.hotels[obj.key].address}
{lowersection}
) } export default InsideHotel;
